name: Note To Self
description:
Note to Self is an interactive adventure that follow's one man's journey to discover the truth.

Advance through his memories and solve surreal puzzles that stretch beyond the confines of the game!

All you need is a mouse and a windows computer.

[This is a Demo Build for Degica's Indie Game Making Contest]

See you in the next life!

Developed by ArcDawn and OutOfCharacters
